prompt_base: photograph of an extremely muscular man, intense focus, spiky golden yellow hair, wearing a torn orange and blue martial arts gi, fighting stance
feature_prompt: RAW photo, cinematic rim lighting, hyperdetailed human skin texture, individual hair strands visible, dramatic shadows, high quality, award-winning photography
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, illustration, plastic texture, smooth plastic hair, bright yellow hair, flat color, orange glow, blurry background, childish, overly saturated, low contrast
